title: Unlucky?
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Nozomi-chan, Nozomi-chaaan, Rin wants to know her fortune, nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Sure thing. What would you like to know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Well, it’s about Rin’s luck today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Your luck for today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Yeah, this morning, a black cat crossed my path. People say that’s a bad omen, right? But Rin loves cats, and Rin thought meeting a cat she likes was supposed to be lucky... That’s why Rin wants you to do some fortune telling!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I see~ Well then, let’s give it a try... umm...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>My heart’s pounding...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Just like you said! Today is your lucky day!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Aha! Rin thought it might be like that! So, can you tell me if Rin will meet that cat again, nya~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Hehe, sure, sure, I’ll tell any fortune you want~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
